VIII.i.3.C.9.h
.
Conditions Not Covered Due to Developmental Etiology
Conditions that are developmental disorders are not covered birth defects.Â  These include, but are not limited to
attention deficit disorder
autism
epilepsy diagnosed after infancy (after the age of one year)
learning disorders, and
mental retardation (unless part of a syndrome that is a covered birth defect).
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Eligibility and Development
citation: Part VIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
